title: Risk Prediction
no_tasks_description: Dear user, we have no tasks for you to complete right now, but if you notice any danger, please let us know.
license_content:
Terms of Service for Risk Prediction app

1. Purpose
The purpose of these Terms of Service is to define the conditions and rules for using the Risk Prediction application (hereinafter referred to as the "Risk Prediction App"). The application is developed to help employees in the factory identify and report potential or ongoing risks, contributing to the improvement of occupational safety and working environment.

2. Scope
These Terms of Service apply to all users of the Application, including:
• Employees: Employees are allowed to use the Application to report risks at the factory.
• Administrators: Individuals authorized to manage the Application, including confirming risk reports, awarding points, and resolving disputes.

3. User Rights and Obligations
3.1 User Rights:
• Download and install the Application for free.
• Use the Application to report risks at the factory.
• Receive reward points for valid risk reports.
• Participate in promotions and offers organized by the Application provider.
3.2 User Obligations:
• Provide accurate and complete information when registering an account.
• Use the Application for legitimate and lawful risk reporting purposes.
• Do not use the Application to disseminate false information, insult, or offend others.
• Do not use the Application to conduct illegal activities or violate factory regulations.
• Keep account information confidential and secure the password.
• Be responsible for all activities using the Application.

4. Application Provider Rights and Obligations
4.1 Application Provider Rights:
• Modify, supplement, or cancel these Terms of Service at any time without prior notice.
• Suspend the provision of Application services or some features of the Application without prior notice.
• Delete user accounts that violate these Terms of Service.
• Use user information for data analysis and service improvement purposes.
4.2 Application Provider Obligations:
• Provide Application services safely and reliably.
• Protect user information in accordance with the law.
• Resolve user complaints fairly and promptly.

5. Rewards
The Application provider may reward points to users for valid risk reports. Reward points can be used to redeem gifts or participate in promotions. The Application provider has the right to stipulate the method of reward and the conditions for redeeming points.

6. Disputes
All disputes related to these Terms of Service will be resolved in accordance with the laws of Vietnam.

7. Changes
The Application provider has the right to modify, supplement, or cancel these Terms of Service at any time without prior notice. Users are responsible for regularly updating these Terms of Service.

8. Recommendations
Although this application is used to report potential risk incidents at factories and enterprises, in emergency situations where risks are occurring, such as fire, explosion, chemical leakage, etc., please report directly to the relevant departments or emergency agencies!

9. Contact
For any questions or complaints related to the Application, please contact the Application provider via:
Phone number: +79969763144
Telegram: +79969763144
Mail: anbinh16209@gmail.com.

I have read and agree to the terms of service.
